A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The complaints are overblown.  Aside from a weak new character (Rose)\, and a little too much filler in the rebel half of the plot\, The Last Jedi is an excellent Star Wars movie.  Kylo Ren has become one of the franchise's best characters\, Mark Hamill is amazing in his return\, and Rey and Finn develop in believeable ways.
